name: Into the Mind (joselor)
description:
Into the Mind is a game made for the Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam. The theme of this jam was Deeper and Deeper, and so we made this game, a Platformer-Shooter in which you explore the farthest depths of your mind, and go deeper and deeper in insanity.

The Team:
Kanda
joselor

Our Ludum Dare page if you wanna rate our game : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/into-the-mind

Thanks for playing !

P.S : I strongly recommand you play the windows version or the web version but in fullscreen for a better experience ( windows is the best of these options )
